helm_secrets_store_csi_driver_metadata.name: csi-secrets-store
helm_secrets_store_csi_driver_metadata.notes:
The Secrets Store CSI Driver is getting deployed to your cluster.

To verify that Secrets Store CSI Driver has started, run:

  kubectl --namespace=kube-system get pods -l "app=secrets-store-csi-driver"

Now you can follow these steps https://secrets-store-csi-driver.sigs.k8s.io/getting-started/usage.html
to create a SecretProviderClass resource, and a deployment using the SecretProviderClass.
